base_description: Tall, white, ornate vase with a lid.
part_description: The vase has a rounded base, a bulbous body, a narrow neck, and a domed lid with a small knob on top.
internal_interaction_description: The lid fits securely on the narrow neck of the vase, ensuring the contents are protected. The bulbous body allows for ample storage space, while the base provides stability. The knob on the lid allows for easy removal and replacement.
external_interaction_description: The vase can hold flowers or decorative items, interacting with its surroundings as a centerpiece. Its white color complements various decor styles, while its tall shape can add height to arrangements. The lid can be removed to accommodate taller items or kept on for a complete look.
